trans-unit.source: Specifies the local execution behavior of a service method.
trans-unit.target: 指定服务方法的本地执行行为。

trans-unit.source: Use the OperationBehaviorAttribute attribute to indicate what operation-specific execution behavior the operation has when executed.
trans-unit.target: 使用 OperationBehaviorAttribute 属性以指示哪些特定操作的执行行为该操作具有时执行。

trans-unit.source: (To specify execution behavior at the service level, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> attribute.) > [!NOTE] > You can also use OperationBehaviorAttribute to configure a callback contract operation in a duplex client application.
trans-unit.target: （若要指定在服务级别的执行行为，请使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute>属性。） &1;> [!NOTE]&1;> OperationBehaviorAttribute 还可用来在双工客户端应用程序中配置回调协定操作。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute>

trans-unit.source: When used on a callback operation, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseInstanceMode%2A> property must be <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode> or an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 对回调操作，使用它时<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseInstanceMode%2A>属性必须为<xref:System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode>或<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>在运行时引发异常。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseInstanceMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OperationBehaviorAttribute attribute is a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] programming model feature that enables common features that developers otherwise must implement themselves.
trans-unit.target: OperationBehaviorAttribute 属性是[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]编程模型功能，使开发人员必须实现自己的常见功能。

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.AutoDisposeParameters%2A> property controls whether parameter objects passed to an operation are disposed when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.AutoDisposeParameters%2A>属性控制当操作完成时是否释放传递给操作的参数对象。</xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.AutoDisposeParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoComplete%2A> property specifies whether the transaction in which the method executes is automatically committed if no unhandled exceptions occur.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoComplete%2A>属性指定在发生任何未经处理的异常不时是否自动提交在其中执行方法的事务。</xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A> property specifies whether a method must execute within a transaction.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A>属性指定是否必须在事务内执行方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.Impersonation%2A> property specifies whether the service operation can, must, or cannot impersonate the caller's identity.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.Impersonation%2A>属性指定服务操作可以、 必须还是无法模拟调用方的标识。</xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.Impersonation%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseInstanceMode%2A> property specifies when service objects are recycled during the method invocation process.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseInstanceMode%2A>属性指定在方法调用过程中何时回收服务对象。</xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseInstanceMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The default constructor creates an instance of the class with the following defaults: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoComplete%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认构造函数创建的类实例使用以下默认值:-<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoComplete%2A>属性是`true`。</xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A>属性是`false`。</xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseInstanceMode%2A> property is <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseInstanceMode%2A>属性是<xref:System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseInstanceMode%2A> -

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.Impersonation%2A> is <xref:System.ServiceModel.ImpersonationOption>.
trans-unit.target: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.Impersonation%2A> is <xref:System.ServiceModel.ImpersonationOption>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ImpersonationOption></xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.Impersonation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether parameters are to be automatically disposed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否自动释放参数。

trans-unit.source: This property determines whether the service disposes all disposable parameters (input, output or reference parameters) that were created while processing a message.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定服务是否释放所有可释放在处理消息时创建的参数 （输入、 输出或引用参数）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `false` if you want to prevent the system from disposing of resources and cache them if required.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为`false`如果你想要阻止系统释放资源并根据需要缓存。

trans-unit.source: For example, if AutoDisposeParameters is `false`, then the sender is responsible for closing the stream on the sending side.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 AutoDisposeParameters 为`false`，则发送方负责关闭在发送端流。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the parameters are to be automatically disposed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果参数自动释放;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the level of caller impersonation that the operation supports.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示的操作支持的调用方模拟级别。

trans-unit.source: Use the Impersonation property (together with a binding configuration that supports impersonation) to enable specified methods (those marked with the Impersonation property set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ImpersonationOption> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.ImpersonationOption>) to execute under the caller's identity.
trans-unit.target: 使用模拟属性 （外加支持模拟的绑定配置） 若要启用指定的方法 (标记的模拟属性设置为<xref:System.ServiceModel.ImpersonationOption>或<xref:System.ServiceModel.ImpersonationOption>) 以在调用方的标识下执行。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ImpersonationOption> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ImpersonationOption>

trans-unit.source: For details, including how impersonation is performed when using <xref:System.ServiceModel.ImpersonationOption> together with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceAuthorizationBehavior.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, see [Delegation and Impersonation](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Impersonate a Client on a Service](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，包括使用时如何执行模拟<xref:System.ServiceModel.ImpersonationOption>连同<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceAuthorizationBehavior.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，请参阅[委托和模拟](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[How to︰ 模拟客户端在服务上的](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceAuthorizationBehavior.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ImpersonationOption>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When programmatically adding a service endpoint that performs impersonation, you must either use one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost.AddServiceEndpoint%2A> methods or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.GetContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to properly load the contract into a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时以编程方式添加执行模拟的服务终结点，你必须使用某一<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost.AddServiceEndpoint%2A>方法或<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.GetContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法以将协定正确加载到新<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName>对象。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.GetContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost.AddServiceEndpoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using a configuration file requires no extra step.
trans-unit.target: 使用配置文件无需额外步骤。

trans-unit.source: There may be specific scenarios when impersonation is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持模拟时，可能是特定的方案。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][Unsupported Scenarios](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][不支持的方案](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ImpersonationOption"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.ServiceModel.ImpersonationOption"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ImpersonationOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.ServiceModel.ImpersonationOption"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates when in the course of an operation invocation to recycle the service object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示在过程中回收服务对象调用操作。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 值不是之一<xref href="System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.AddBindingParameters*> method.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.AddBindingParameters*>方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.AddBindingParameters*>

trans-unit.source: The operation description modified to support <xref href="System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute"></xref> properties.
trans-unit.target: 操作说明修改，可支持<xref href="System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute"></xref>属性。

trans-unit.source: Binding parameters passed to support binding behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 绑定参数传递为支持绑定行为。

trans-unit.source: Implements the client operation behavior.
trans-unit.target: 实现客户端操作行为。

trans-unit.source: The operation description modified to support <xref href="System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute"></xref> properties.
trans-unit.target: 操作说明修改，可支持<xref href="System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute"></xref>属性。

trans-unit.source: The extensibility access point to insert custom client modifications for this operation.
trans-unit.target: 扩展访问点用于插入此操作的自定义客户端修改。

trans-unit.source: Implements the service operation behavior.
trans-unit.target: 实现服务操作行为。

trans-unit.source: The operation description modified to support <xref href="System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute"></xref> properties.
trans-unit.target: 操作说明修改，可支持<xref href="System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute"></xref>属性。

trans-unit.source: The extensibility point to insert custom service modifications for this operation.
trans-unit.target: 要插入此操作的自定义服务修改的扩展点。

trans-unit.source: Implements the validation behavior.
trans-unit.target: 实现验证行为。

trans-unit.source: The operation description to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的操作说明。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to automatically complete the current transaction scope if no unhandled exceptions occur.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否自动完成当前的事务范围，如果不发生任何未经处理的异常。

trans-unit.source: Set the TransactionAutoComplete property to `false` to complete or abort transactions directly in the code for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 将 TransactionAutoComplete 属性设置为`false`可以完成或中止直接在操作代码中的事务。

trans-unit.source: Handled exceptions can be thrown in the course of the operation without automatically aborting the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 可以在操作过程中会引发处理的异常，而不会自动中止事务。

trans-unit.source: Only unhandled exceptions trigger an automatic abort.
trans-unit.target: 未经处理的异常会触发自动中止。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to complete the transaction scope automatically on successful execution of the operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要完成事务范围自动在成功执行该操作;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the method requires a transaction scope for its execution.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示方法是否需要其执行的事务作用域。

trans-unit.source: Set the TransactionScopeRequired to `true` to require your operation to execute within a transaction scope.
trans-unit.target: TransactionScopeRequired 设置为`true`可以要求操作在事务范围内执行。

trans-unit.source: If a flowed transaction is available, the operation executes within that transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果流的事务可用，则操作会在该事务内执行。

trans-unit.source: If one is not available, a new transaction is created and used for the operation execution.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个不可用，一个新的事务创建，并用于执行操作。

trans-unit.source: The binding specified in the endpoint controls whether flowed transactions are supported.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的绑定的终结点控件是否支持流的事务。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, to obtain the proper behavior you must understand the interaction between whether transaction flow is permitted by the binding and the TransactionScopeRequired property.
trans-unit.target: 因此，若要获取正确的行为必须了解之间的绑定和 TransactionScopeRequired 属性是否允许事务流的交互。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the possible behavior.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示可能的行为。

trans-unit.source: ||||| |-|-|-|-| |TransactionScopeRequired|Binding permits transaction flow|Caller flows transaction|Result| |False|False|No|Method executes without a transaction.| |True|False|No|Method creates and executes within a new transaction.| |True or False|False|Yes|A SOAP fault is returned for the transaction header.| |False|True|Yes|Method executes without a transaction.| |True|True|Yes|Method executes under the flowed transaction.|
trans-unit.target: ||||| |-|-|-|-| |TransactionScopeRequired |绑定允许事务流 |调用方的事务流动 |结果 | |False |False |否 |没有事务的情况下执行的方法。 | |True |False |否 |方法创建并在新的事务中执行。 | |True 或 False |False |是 |事务标头返回 SOAP 错误。 | |False |True |是 |没有事务的情况下执行的方法。 | |True |True |是 |方法在流事务下执行。 |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the method requires a transaction scope to execute; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果方法需要事务范围才能执行;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
